channel.title: CVE Feed for SAP SE -- SAP Business Planning and Consolidation
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SAP SE -- SAP Business Planning and Consolidation

item.title: CVE-2020-6368|2024-08-04T09:02:40.215Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20business%20planning%20and%20consolidation
item.description: SAP Business Planning and Consolidation, versions - 750, 751, 752, 753, 754, 755, 810, 100, 200, can be abused by an attacker, allowing them to modify displayed application content without authorization, and to potentially obtain authentication information from other legitimate users, leading to Cross Site Scripting.
